summary: Fate reuintes college friends a year after graduation and they decide to recapture the idealistic spirit of their college days.
cast: Charlotte Ayanna|Ethan Embry|Peter Facinelli|Scott Foley|Jennifer Garner|Jeff Anderson|Debra Christofferson|Gabriel Olds|Charles Walker|Gary Werntz|Kiele Sanchez|Victor McCay|Annalouise Paul|Paul Dooley|Lenny Goldsmith|Jan Bartlett|Candace Kita|Mike Gabrawy|Kiesha McCorry|Diane Hudock|Parker Swanson|Stef Zamorano|Sarah Zinsser|David Aronson|Michael Garrity|Aaron Skalka|Deeonna Lanay|Frank Novak|Ben Falcone|Keesia Kordelle|Eugene Wells|Laura Wells|Callan White|Tom McComas|Ric Payne|Sean Patrick Murphy|Annie Abbott|Lorraine Montgomery|Andy Greenberg|Debra Snell|Brandon Johnson|Shane Brolly|Adam Carrera|Don 'Tex' Clark
title: Rennie's landing
